snippet: Mozambique's Renamo opposition party and rebel movement extended a ceasefire by two months on Friday to allow further peace talks with President Filipe Nyusi's government, raising hopes of an end to years of tit-for-tat violence....

headline.main: Peak Gasoline Demand Looms With Engine Efficiency Gains
headline.print_headline: Peak Gasoline Demand Looms With Engine Efficiency Gains

lead_paragraph: Mozambique's Renamo opposition party and rebel movement extended a ceasefire by two months on Friday to allow further peace talks with President Filipe Nyusi's government, raising hopes of an end to years of tit-for-tat violence.
